Label: SC_CARRIER_SPECIFIC
Comment: "Network internal services in the numbering plan are actually carrier specific services.\nThe maximum length is specified as 'any' but here they're limited to 6 since that's\nthe maximum of any other short number for Spain."

Label: SC_SHORT_CODE
Comment: "133, 134 and 177 aren't in the numbering plan but on vodafone's homepage as short\nnumbers."

Label: SC_STANDARD_RATE
Comment:
"Section 6.2 of Guia Numeracion (link above).
Section 2 and 3 specify that the standard rate from mobile phones is 18-20 cents/min,
using this as a guideline the numbers having a cost in the doc have been placed either
as standard or premium rate."

Label: XML_FIXED_LINE
Comment: "The pattern is complex because the Lleida Networks mobile ranges are inside the\nfixed-line ranges. As per official announcement, 919 prefix is assigned to\nMadrid area http://www.boe.es/boe/dias/2016/11/17/pdfs/BOE-A-2016-10756.pdf."

Label: XML_MOBILE
Comment: "The ranges 969060900 to 969061099 and 973900000 to 973909999 are mobile according to\ninformation received from Lleida Networks. Added 78 range based on user bug reports."
